rules.description: Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Use Delete as Move to Trash
Use Return as Open and Use Fn+Return as Rename
swap cmd <-> option when using specific devices
caps lock -> escape(alone) and caps lock -> hyper
Cmd + Q held 1 second to quit
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Use Delete as Move to Trash
